title: Margaret Benson: compilation of nine 8mm home movies
brief_description: A compilation of nine silent 8mm home movies donated by Margaret Benson comprising images of the Westgate Bridge during construction (1970), Ringwood Technical School, Narooma (1973-74), Barossa Valley wineries, Macleod Technical School (1972).
